content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to talk about feeling unwell during a visit to the doctor's office, 'beim Hausarzt'.

data.tip: The 'rzt' sound is a bit tricky. It's like saying 'arts' with a 't' at the end: 'Artst'.

content.title: Checking In
content.setting: You arrive at the doctor's office. First, you speak to the receptionist, then to the doctor.

conversation_flow.title: State that you have an appointment
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Okay, einen Moment bitte... Der Arzt ist bereit. Guten Tag! Was fehlt Ihnen?

conversation_flow.title: Explain your main symptom (headache)
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Verstehe. Und seit wann haben Sie die Kopfschmerzen?

conversation_flow.title: Say how long you have had this problem

content.text: Great start! Now let's learn how to describe more symptoms and answer the doctor's questions.
You can use the phrase 'Mein [body part] tut weh' to say something hurts. For example, 'Mein Kopf tut weh'.

content.title: Answering Questions
content.setting: The doctor asks for more details about your symptoms.

conversation_flow.title: Tell the doctor what you have already taken

content.text: Well done. Finally, let's learn how to ask for clarification and conclude the appointment.

data.phrase: Können Sie das bitte langsam wiederholen?
data.meaning: Can you please repeat that slowly?

content.title: Understanding Advice
content.setting: The doctor gives you advice. You need to understand it and end the conversation.

conversation_flow.title: Ask the doctor to repeat slowly
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Okay. Sie sollten viel Wasser trinken und zu Hause bleiben.

conversation_flow.title: Ask if you need a prescription
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja. Trinken Sie viel Wasser. Bleiben Sie zu Hause.

conversation_flow.title: Thank the doctor and say goodbye
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Nein, ein Rezept ist nicht nötig. Gute Besserung!
